name: Lancer
flavor_text: As a Lancer, you are incapable of having a mount (player or otherwise). However, you are much like one yourself, and so can go to battle much as the Chevaliers do. You will be capable of using heavy blades, light blades and polearms, though your preference will likely run to longspears, claymores, javelins and bastard swords. Your skills will be varied, preparing you for many walks of life, but you may not be a particular master at any one thing. Are you quite certain?
